title: Scronco Wrestling Podcast

Stay tuned for all shows and debuting shows.

title: Welcome to Thunderdome!
description:
Welcome to Welcome to Thunderdome!  The internet's A+ review of the world's best B show!

Join two New York marks (Andrew Jones and Nick Sciretta) as they punch their one-way ticket to Larryland by reviewing every episode of WCW Thunder ever!

New episodes on Thursdays!
instagram/twitter: @thunderdomecast

title: Guard the Bard
description: A D&D podcast where 3 guards guard a bard.
author_name: Brenan Chacon, Jacob Pierce, Peter Balser, Nate Davis, Andy Haack

title: Subject To Change: Another Pro-Wrestling Podcast
description: 'Subject to Change' is a free-form, discussion-based podcast with topics surrounding anything and everything within the world of professional wrestling. Join "The Fabulous Three Bro's", Vince Lacey, Chad Gelfand, and Dylan Miller as they break down all of the top news stories and events that occur on weekly programming, including WWE, AEW, (sometimes) iMPACT, and more. *Disclaimer* Although there are points of discussion planned to occur prior to the recording of each episode, oftentimes the hosts will dive deeper into rabbit holes of related topics. Therefore, as always, content is 'subject to change' ;).

title: The Grappling Arts Podcast
description:
Wrestling Resurgence presents: The Grappling Arts Podcast where we explore the craft of professional wrestling! 

Welcome to The Grappling Arts Podcast, where we celebrate the art of professional wrestling, explore wrestling practice, and dig deep into its rich and varied history. Throughout the series we bring you interviews with leading figures from within the independent wrestling community, as well as a variety of expert guests and contributors. Topics such a theatre, sport, storytelling, and performance! 

Hosted by Wrestling Resurgence producer/doctoral researcher Sam West and theatre and professional wrestling scholar Claire Warden.

title: HumanzeeJitzu Podcast
description: The Best Podcast About a Niche Sport in a Tiny County

title: Book It Vince!
description: There are some wrestling matches we can only dream of. Welcome to BOOK IT VINCE! Pro wrestling superfans Martin Bennett and Antony Hall are here to dive deep into how these feuds would play out as they challenge each other to book over-the-top dream matches.

title: Keep The Kayfabe
description: A Milwaukee-based pro wrestling podcast for old-School and new-school wrestling marks. Fantasy booking, predictions, all-time lists, and current happenings in the wide world of professional wrestling.

title: Tranos & the Lived Experience
description:
Welcome to Tranos and the Lived Experience! 
A podcast confronting current events, politics, comedy, and calamity from the perspective of a Trans Titaness.  She’s a verbal black belt, skilled in the Roast arts! The "Hell Mouth",  "Doom Sayer."
C.E.O. of the Amazon Position! Here’s your host, Kamryn Ehlen Jerrel...

title: Noobs and Knockouts
description: Austin has watched a lot of wrestling. David has never watched wrestling. Together they come together to watch and analysis professional wrestling as a television show and cultural staple. Won't you join us?

title: Grappling With Canada
description: Welcome to Grappling With Canada! Each month Andy "The Taxman" is joined by various guests to take a deep dive into the past of some of Canada's most influential, infamous and impressive Wrestling exports! Not a Canadian? Don't worry, no passport needed! The international connections of wrestling with and to Canada will surprise you!

title: Snap Dragon Duplex
description: Snap Dragon Duplex with the Monkey Man Mikey Mac, the King of Calm Randy Phill and the Dirtiest of Dirties Dirty Dave Nitro discussing the latest of AEW, WWE and anything noteworthy related to wrestling.
author_name: Monkey Man Mikey Mac, Randy Phill, Dave Nitro

title: How I Caught The Wrestling Bug
description: Every week I am joined by fellow Wrestling fans to discuss how they caught the 'wrestling bug' and how their fandom has evolved over the years.

title: ASAP Podcast
description:
Pro Wrestling & Everything In-Between! 

Join our hosts Beard Villain Johnny Malloy & Pancakes (along with Executive Producer Boo Boo & Little Monster Binky) for their outrageous brand of pro wrestling, laughs, hi-jinx, greener grass, and staying positive!

title: One Fall! Podcast

Join Sean McHugh and Rob Quinn as we discuss all things Pro-Wrestling!

Whether its WWE, AEW, NJPW, and more, we'll recap what's happened this week in wrestling and give you our takes on what to watch, what can improve, and even do some fantasy bookings of our own!

title: MARC PEARSON
description: Longtime Youtuber, longtime DNB DJ, here you'll find some old stuff, some new stuff!

title: Cheap Pop Rasslin' Podcast
description:
This kind of CPR won't save your life, but it might revive your love of wrestling!

Join us as we dive into our love of the squared circle, predicting, reviewing, arguing and competing to be crowned the ultimate mark!

Available wherever you get your podcasts.

Home of the Cheap Pop FANTASY FACTION! A fantasy league game pitting wrestling podcasts and content creators against each other.

If you're involved in the wrestling community and have wrestling content to promote; JOIN OUR FREE GAME by heading to our Instagram.

https://linktr.ee/cheappoprasslin

title: The Ruthless Journey
description:
Welcome to The Ruthless Journey Podcast where we look at the goings on in the greatest period in the history of WWF/WWE between October 2002 - December 2005. There will be big debuts and big duds, great matches and great disappointments, electrifying moments and distasteful storylines, and maybe a bit of Heidenreich thrown in there as well if we're lucky.

If you want to back me on Patreon you can at https://www.patreon.com/TheRuthlessJourney

For updates on episodes and more follow me on Instagram at the_ruthless_journey

title: Combat Sports Podcast
description:
This podcast involves interviewing traditional martial artists. We hear their stories and journeys, the way they overcame challenges and learn how to be better people through the guests martial arts experiences.

Hosted By Josh, Alex & Eoin

title: HeBookSheBook
description:
Hosted by Mike Leanza and Rebecca McCauley, this one of a kind pro-wrestling podcast offers unique insight and in-depth discussion about both past and present WWE and AEW events. 

Offering a male and female perspective from two lifelong wrestling fans, this is rapid reaction meets fantasy booking. Your two hosts will serve up unique opinions and use this creative outlet to show fans what could, would, or should be happening with your favorite pro-wrestling stars. This is HeBookSheBook.

title: HoopPlex
description: The HoopPlex crew talks the latest news, biggest stories, and most interesting topics in the worlds of basketball and wrestling, unscripted and uncensored.

description: Paul is a US Army Combat Veteran, Former MMA fighter, and YouTubers. He breaks down news, drama, and issues with his occasional flashes of insight! Enjoy!

title: The Desire Line
description:
A desire line is formed from many people over time choosing not to walk the paved paths, but instead go the way that seems most expedient to them.  they are typically formed when planners don't account for real human behavior.

James Reilly and Jess Finley discuss everything from Historical Martial Arts to parenting, modern mentorship to aristotelian scholarship, Sport climbing and BJJ to domination culture and shame.

If you have an interest in recreating martial arts, but wanna see where those ideas take us in our efforts to be better people in the modern world, have a listen.

description: Hello there welcome to yet another Canadian podcast I am based out of Ontario so yes, I'm a Leafs fan but don't worry Leafs ain't gonna be the only thing I chat about! I will tackle the league as a whole talking about news, trades, predictions and so much more? Are you really a true Canadian If you don't watch wrestling!? Well follow me Jabroni and ill give you the wrestling recap , reviews and more brother! I ain't done yet folks! i'm also a very passionate gamer so why not thrown in some nerdy gamer talk? I'll also dive into my career in videos games giving you reviews, top 10 lists and whatever you wanna talk about gaming! Welcome to the GXPlusCast!

title: Envy Me: A Dynasty Podcast
description: After 4 years removed from the public eye Chris Envy, the fearless leader of Dynasty Wrestling is prepared to once again make his return to the Professional Wrestling world. Co-hosted by accredited filmmaker Travis Manney, the Envy Me Podcast will take you through the rise, fall, and rise again of one of the North East’s most respected professional wrestling promotions. Hear about Chris' life outside of wrestling, and hear stories so insane you wouldn’t believe them if they weren’t coming directly from the source! Ensure you don’t miss out by subscribing to “Envy Me: A Dynasty Podcast” today!

title: What About Wrestling
description: What About Wrestling provides video and audio coverage of professional wrestling - including WWE (including WWE Raw, WWE SmackDown, NXT and 205 Live), AEW, IMPACT Wrestling (formerly TNA), NJPW, ROH, and more with daily news updates, reviews, lists, highlights, predictions, reactions, podcasts and much, much more.

title: Beyond The Rules
description:
Beyond The Rules is a sports and culture podcast told through the lens of officials/umpires/coaches.

It explores games and sports “Beyond the Rules” and provide insight and perspectives that usually remain untold. The mission is for officials and coaches to have a place to speak their minds and talk about officiating/coaching from their view.

BTR is hosted by creator Stephen Batista who is also a varsity level umpire and wrestling official.

Curtis Dugar, a division 1 NCAA umpire is a frequent guest who lends his expertise and knowledge on the craft. Curtis’ knowledge of what it takes to be an umpire goes well Beyond the Rules.

“Talkin’ Shop” is a series that features Carlos Dolmo. A good friend and mentor to host Stephen, the two let it all out with great candor and pull the curtain back with anecdotes and road stories on being an official.

Stephen also delves deep into the lives of other officials, coaches, assignors and everyone involved in sports as they all talk about the love of the game “Beyond the Rules”.

title: 1973 Podcast
description:
Welcome to the "1973 Podcast"!

Step back in time and join us as we journey through life with the wisdom and experiences of three friends who were born in the iconic year of 1973. If you're a part of the Generation X crowd or simply curious about the 70s, this podcast is tailor-made for you.

Join your hosts – "Your Hockey Hero," "The Professor," and "Mouth of the South" – as they bring you a unique and engaging perspective on the world. With half a century of life under their belts, they're here to share their insights, anecdotes, and observations on everything that has shaped our world.

Main Topics and Themes:

Dive into a variety of captivating subjects that have kept these lifelong friends engaged and intrigued:

🏒 Hockey: Whether it's reminiscing about classic games, analyzing the current state of the NHL, or sharing personal hockey stories, you'll get your fill of puck talk.

🤼 Pro Wrestling: Step into the squared circle as the hosts relive legendary matches, discuss the evolution of wrestling, and offer a ringside seat to their favorite moments.

📺 Pop Culture: From the music and movies that defined the era to the cultural shifts that continue to influence us today, explore the world of pop culture through the lens of the 70s.

Tone and Style:

Expect lively conversations, hearty laughs, and unfiltered opinions as these friends come together in a casual and conversational setting. You'll feel like you're hanging out with them, sharing stories and insights over your favorite drinks.

Special Features and Unique Selling Points:

What sets the "1973 Podcast" apart is the authentic and relatable perspective these hosts bring. They're not just pundits – they're real guys who've lived through it all. Get ready for a nostalgic trip down memory lane with individuals who've been there, done that, and are excited to share their journey with you.

Join Us:

Tune in weekly to catch a new episode where "Your Hockey Hero," "The Professor," and "Mouth of the South" take you on a captivating ride through their unique perspectives on hockey, pro wrestling, pop culture, and life in general.

So, if you're a fellow child of the 70s or simply intrigued by the Generation X experience, hit that subscribe button and get ready to be entertained, enlightened, and immersed in the world of the "1973 Podcast"!

title: Game Rage Wrasslin! Podcast
description: A show that talks about the good old days and even the current times of Professional Wrestling. Go to www.gameragemagazine.com for our full lineup of podcasts and content!

title: Talent Alone Pro Wrestling Podcast
description: Mike, of TalentAlone.Com, takes on the wrestling world. Breaking down AEW, WWE and Historical content. All while defending CM Punk no matter what happens.

title: Hot Tag Podcast
description: 🎙️ Subscribe to The Hot Tag Podcast! 🎙️ 🔥 Get ready for the ultimate wrestling discussion Join us as we dive into the sizzling world of professional wrestling, breaking down the biggest headlines from the past week. 🤯 Unravel the details and speculations surrounding the wrestling landscape. 🏟️ Tune in and let hot tag begin! Subscribe, hit the notification bell, and get ready to be smacked with the hottest takes in the world of wrestling! 🔥🤼‍♂️

title: Wanna Watch AEW?
description:
Hey, wanna watch AEW??

WWAEW is the premier AEW rewatch podcast! Hosts Ramin and Cali are massive AEW marks. While Ramin is a life-long wrestling fan, Cali has only a passing familiarity with the sport and has only watched AEW since January 2023, and they love it!

Now that the company is 5 years old and has put on one of the biggest wrestling shows in history, we thought it would be a fitting time to look back at how this whole wild wrestling alternative started. Was Tony Khan the saviour of wrestling like we all hoped? How well did the win/loss record booking work? Is Orange Cassidy actually cool? We want to examine whether the road to All In at Wembley has been as golden-bricked as it seemed in 2019.

So, Wanna Watch AEW with us??

We'd love to hear from you! WannawatchAEW@gmail.com

Feel like throwing us a buck or two? Visit our patreon: patreon.com/user?u=272341

title: Squared Triangle
description: A wrestling podcast brought to you by three friends who love wrestling. Part of the [Without Context] Network.

title: Icopals Podcast
description: The Ico Pals Podcast Is A Podcast That Us Grizzlys (Adam,David,Alex) Talk About Various Topics And Sometimes Have A Special Guest On To Add To These Topics.

title: Punks Talk Wrestling
description:
Are you a Punk?

Do you like Professional Wrestling?

If either or neither of those are true you should listen to Punks Talk Wrestling. Every week join the Cruiserweight of Rock RW Hellborn and the Proper Prick CJ Newman as these two long time friends deep dive into all things Professional Wrestling and Punk Rock and everything in between!

title: Just Bleed Radio
description: MMA Podcast the also dabbles in current events
author_name: No Special, LazyBed, DangerMouse and Superdave Fairtex

title: When Wrestling Was Real To Me
description: The podcast that brings Real World and FirstTake in the WWE ring, get ready to go Down memory lane.

title: A Look Back with Mike
description: The official home of A Look Back with Mike. Together we're 'Looking Back on Wrestling's Greatest Moments'. The views of this channel are the personal views of the host and do not reflect on any views or positions of any professional entity.

title: What's The Tea
description: If you want the latest news in wrestling, sports, music and pretty much wherever the tea is brewing join me @OwenTheMan316 for teatime on what's the tea, but always remember to keep your pinkie out and glass full because teatime can happen at any time and any place.

title: BJJ Balance
description:
Welcome to "The BJJ Balance: Beyond the Gi" – the podcast where the world of jiu-jitsu collides with a variety of intriguing subjects! Join your hosts, a blue belt aficionado, and a seasoned black belt, as they take you on a journey that goes far beyond the mats.

In each episode, our hosts delve into the depths of jiu-jitsu, discussing techniques, training tips, and their personal grappling adventures. But that's just the beginning! "The BJJ Balance: Beyond the Gi" is all about the dynamic interplay between the gentle art and other loosely related topics that pique their curiosity.

One week, they might unravel the mysteries of mindfulness and its synergy with the mental aspects of jiu-jitsu. In another episode, you'll find them exploring the parallels between the philosophy of martial arts and life's everyday challenges. Whether they're sharing stories from the dojo, interviewing special guests from various walks of life, or simply riffing on the unexpected connections they discover, these hosts guarantee a podcast experience that's as informative as it is entertaining.

From discussing the physical benefits of jiu-jitsu to dissecting its historical origins, "The BJJ Balance: Beyond the Gi" offers listeners a well-rounded perspective on the art of grappling and how it weaves into the broader tapestry of existence. So whether you're a dedicated practitioner, a curious newcomer, or just someone who loves engaging conversations, tune in and roll with us as we explore the exhilarating world of jiu-jitsu and the fascinating subjects it intertwines with.

title: The Backseat Wrestler Podcast
description:
Two non-wrestler brothers but life-long wrestling fans talk weekly news on WWE, AEW and all things wrestling! From show recaps to news outside the ring, we have things to say about it! But take our opinions like a grain of salt - we're Backseat Wrestlers after all.

Listen on SpotifySend voice message
